name: Gobble
description:
Fight for your life! The eggs! The corn! Keep yourself energized enough to bring the egg basket back home!

WASD to move  LMB to Punch E to Interact with the basket

Goal: Protect the egg basket and bring it back to the portal intact! Kill the corn enemies attacking you and the basket. Eat the loot to stay energized enough to be able to jump and run while holding the basket.
